title: AegisTech - Premium 35pt Magnetic Card Holder (25+ Elite Box) - Penny Sleeves Included - Perfect for PTCG, MTG, YGO and All Other Standard Size Trading and Sports Cards
features: AegisTech 35pt Magnetic Card Holders for cards size 63mm x 88mm, penny sleeves and Elite storage box included. The ultimate in safeguarding your valuable PTCG, MTG, YGO and other standard size cards.
PROTECTION - High-quality materials provide superior durability, scratch resistance, and a UV barrier to prevent card fading. Also included are acid-free clear card sleeves - 1 per trading card case.
SAFE & SECURE - Slide in hinges make opening and closing easy, whilst a strong magnet keeps the magnetic card holder closed, ensuring your card remains safe during storage, transportation or display.

STYLISH - The sleek design and frosted boarder elevate the overall presentation of your card collection, card display or TCG card storage setup. Suitable for collectors, enthusiasts, and gamers alike.
EXTRA – Includes a durable, hard-shell case with a smooth magnetic lid for quick access and secure closure. Keeps all 25 holders neatly stored and protected in one place.
description: Product Description AegisTech - 35PT Magnetic Card Holders Introducing the AegisTech Premium 35pt Magnetic Trading Card Holder, the ultimate solution for collectors and enthusiasts seeking unparalleled protection and display for their prized trading cards. Designed with precision and crafted for excellence, these magnetic card holders are perfect for safeguarding your collection of PTCG, Magic: The Gathering (MTG), Yu-Gi-Oh! (YGO), and all other standard-size trading and sports cards. Handle With Confidence Whether you're organizing your collection in trading card storage albums & cases or setting up a trading card display, these card protector sleeves offer the perfect blend of functionality and aesthetics. Superior Protection Designed with precision and crafted for excellence, these magnetic card holders are perfect for collectors and enthusiasts of PTCG, MTG, YGO, and all other standard-size trading cards. Each holder is engineered to provide superior protection, ensuring your cards remain in pristine condition while on display or in storage. With the added bonus of penny sleeves included, your cards will have an extra layer of defense against dust, moisture, and handling wear - a step up from traditional toploaders. Crystal Clear Our magnetic card holders are not just about protection; they are about showcasing your collection with style and confidence. The crystal-clear design of these trading card sleeves allows for unobstructed viewing, making them ideal for both display and storage. The only choice Whether you're a seasoned collector or just starting your journey, our card holders provide the peace of mind you need to focus on what truly matters—enjoying and expanding your collection. Invest in the best with AegisTech and experience the ultimate in TCG card storage and protection.
